28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that people among the Companions of the Prophet (S.A.W) would say:"Truffles are the earth's smallpox." So the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) said: "Truffles are a form of manna, and its liquid is a cure for the eye. Al-'Ajwah is from Paradise, and it contains a cure for poison

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْكَمْأَةِ وَالْعَجْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Truffles And Al-'Ajwah
